alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Ransom; Richland; Sargent (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 19 at 9:07AM CST until February 19 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Wilkin County. In North Dakota, Barnes, Sargent, Ransom and Richland Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
